allow_ip_spoofing.name: allow_ip_spoofing
allow_ip_spoofing.description: Allow IP spoofing on the primary network interface

block_storage_volumes.name: block_storage_volumes
block_storage_volumes.description: List describing the block storage volumes that will be attached to each vsi

boot_volume_encryption_key.name: boot_volume_encryption_key
boot_volume_encryption_key.description: CRN of boot volume encryption key

create_security_group.name: create_security_group
create_security_group.description: Create security group for VSI. If this is passed as false, the default will be used

enable_floating_ip.name: enable_floating_ip
enable_floating_ip.description: Create a floating IP for each virtual server created

image_id.name: image_id
image_id.description: Image ID used for VSI. Run 'ibmcloud is images' to find available images in a region

load_balancers.name: load_balancers
load_balancers.description: Load balancers to add to VSI

machine_type.name: machine_type
machine_type.description: VSI machine type. Run 'ibmcloud is instance-profiles' to get a list of regional profiles

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: The IBM Cloud platform API key needed to deploy IAM enabled resources

resource_group_id.name: resource_group_id
resource_group_id.description: id of resource group to create VPC

secondary_allow_ip_spoofing.name: secondary_allow_ip_spoofing
secondary_allow_ip_spoofing.description: Allow IP spoofing on additional network interfaces

secondary_floating_ips.name: secondary_floating_ips
secondary_floating_ips.description: List of secondary interfaces to add floating ips

secondary_security_groups.name: secondary_security_groups
secondary_security_groups.description: IDs of additional security groups to be added to VSI deployment secondary interfaces. A VSI interface can have a maximum of 5 security groups.

secondary_subnets.name: secondary_subnets
secondary_subnets.description: List of secondary network interfaces to add to vsi secondary subnets must be in the same zone as VSI. This is only recommended for use with a deployment of 1 VSI.

secondary_use_vsi_security_group.name: secondary_use_vsi_security_group
secondary_use_vsi_security_group.description: Use the security group created by this module in the secondary interface

security_group.name: security_group

security_group_ids.name: security_group_ids
security_group_ids.description: IDs of additional security groups to be added to VSI deployment primary interface. A VSI interface can have a maximum of 5 security groups.

ssh_key_ids.name: ssh_key_ids
ssh_key_ids.description: ssh key ids to use in creating vsi

subnets.name: subnets
subnets.description: A list of subnet IDs where VSI will be deployed

tags.name: tags
tags.description: List of tags to apply to resources created by this module.

user_data.name: user_data
user_data.description: User data to initialize VSI deployment

vsi_per_subnet.name: vsi_per_subnet
vsi_per_subnet.description: Number of VSI instances for each subnet

fip_list.name: fip_list
fip_list.description: A list of VSI with name, id, zone, and primary ipv4 address, and floating IP. This list only contains instances with a floating IP attached.

lb_hostnames.name: lb_hostnames
lb_hostnames.description: Hostnames for the Load Balancer created

list.name: list
list.description: A list of VSI with name, id, zone, and primary ipv4 address
